item.title: Destiny 2: Xur Exotic Armor, Weapon, and Recommendations for August 22
item.description:
Xur has returned again to Destiny 2 , complete with new exotic and legendary gear for players to check out for a limited time. Change is upon Destiny 2 as longtime Bungie CEO Pete Parsons announced his retirement from the company. In his place will be a 15-year Bungie veteran, Justin Truman, who has worn many hats at the company, from being an engineer, designer, to General Manager for Destiny 2 as well as Chief Development Officer.

In addition to studio changes, Bungie also revealed upcoming changes to Destiny 2 alongside the Ash & Iron update in September. While the studio previously teased buffs for Destiny 2 's Warlock class, this recent blog post was a bit more controversial with planned changes to the Portal, including nerfs to the Solo Ops playlist where drops will be lower in power to encourage players to engage more with Fireteam and Pinnacle Ops.

For now, the weekend merchant Xur is back with a new inventory of gear for Destiny 2 players. Follow this guide for his current weekend location, news on his exotic cipher quest, as well as a review of all the exotic and legendary gear he's brought for the weekend of August 15, 2025.

Where is Xur?

Xur has now taken up permanent residence in the Bazaar area inside The Tower, so there's no more hunting when the weekend comes around.

Since the Bazaar is located between both fast travel points, players can pick either one to load into. Head into the area where Ikora and Hawthorne are and look for the Ramen Shop towards the back wall. While facing the shop, the alley is to the right, where Xur is standing.

Destiny 2 Class Armor

Starting with the Edge of Fate expansion, Xur's role in the Tower has expanded a bit. While Xur no longer carries legendary armor, the merchant has increased his exotic offering by selling two pieces of gear for each class each week. Xur's new Destiny 2 inventory can still be found at the Tower Bazaar.

Xur's Exotic Armor

Cenotaph Mask - Warlock helmet

Exotic Perk :

  • High Priority - Steadily reloads a portion of your equipped Trace Rifle's magazine from reserves. Damaging a vehicle, boss, or Champion with a Trace Rifle marks them as the target. When an ally defeats the marked target, Special ammo is generated for you and Heavy ammo for your allies.

Stat Values (60 Total):

  • Health +0
  • Melee +0
  • Grenade +29
  • Super +20
  • Class +11
  • Weapons +0

Claws of Ahamkara - Warlock gauntlets

Exotic Perk :

  • The Whispers - Gain an additional melee charge. Powered melee final blows spawn an Orb of Power.

Stat Values (60 Total):

  • Health +12
  • Melee +0
  • Grenade +30
  • Super +18
  • Class +0
  • Weapons +0

The Sixth Coyote - Hunter chest armor

Exotic Perk :

  • Double Dodge - Gain a second dodge charge. Shortly after dodging, your next weapon final blow spawns an Orb of Power.

Stat Values (60 Total):

  • Health +12
  • Melee +0
  • Grenade +30
  • Super +18
  • Class +0
  • Weapons +0

Blight Ranger - Hunter helmet

Exotic Perk :

  • Voltaic Mirror - Guarding with your Arc Staff does not consume extra Super energy. Cancel Arc Staff early, temporarily increasing Arc weapon damage and creating a blinding burst. Reflected attacks increase the damage of the burst, extend your Super, and deal additional damage.

Stat Values (60 Total):

  • Health +11
  • Melee +19
  • Grenade +0
  • Super +30
  • Class +0
  • Weapons +0

Ashen Wake - Titan gauntlets

Exotic Perk :

  • Bring the Heat - Fusion Grenades gain increased throw speed, explode on impact, and stun Unstoppable Champions. Final blows with Fusion Grenades grant grenade energy.

Stat Values (62 total):

  • Health +0
  • Melee +19
  • Grenade +13
  • Super +30
  • Class +0
  • Weapons +0

Blastwave Striders - Titan leg armor

Exotic Perk :

  • Blastwave Striders - Gain resistance to your explosives. Defeat targets to charge this armor. Once charged, slide or deal explosive self-damage to rocket jump backward and blast deadly shrapnel projectiles that spawn Stasis crystals on impact. Charged rocket jumps grant Frost Armor.

Stat Values (60 Total):

  • Health +0
  • Melee +0
  • Grenade +29
  • Super +20
  • Class +11
  • Weapons +0

Xur Inventory Items

Year 7 in Destiny 2 has upgraded Xur's inventory, adding a true rank progression system, rewards, as well as focusing options. Xur also has more than just weapons and armor as well, including:

  • Sunshot Catalyst
  • Tractor Cannon Catalyst
  • Essentialism/Stoicism/Solipsism OR Exotic Cipher
  • Exotic Engram
  • Ascendant Alloy
  • Glimmer
  • Enhancement Core
  • Raid Banner (7 for 11 Strange Coins)
  • Favor of the Nine
  • Strange Gift (Random Item for 1 Strange Coin)

Exotic Ciphers

  • Xenology - Complete activities in the Portal with a performance grade B or higher. Additional progress is awarded for better performance grades, activities with a longer average duration, and for succeeding with clanmates.

Xur's Exotic Weapons

Here is what Xur has this weekend for exotic weapons:

Hawkmoon - Hand Cannon

  • Paracausal Shot - Final blows and precision hits with Hawkmoon grant stacks of Paracausal Charge. The final round in the magazine deals bonus damage based on the number of stacks. Stowing Hawkmoon on the final round removes this bonus.
  • Arrowhead Brake
  • Alloy Magazine
  • Eye of the Storm
  • Polymer Grip

Cerberus+1 - Auto Rifle

  • Four-Headed Dog - Shoots erratic bullets from all gun barrels at the same time.
  • Spread Shot Package - Aiming this weapon reduces the spread of its projectiles.
  • Fluted Barrel
  • Rifled Barrel
  • Full Bore

Hard Light - Auto Rifle

  • Volatile Light - Rounds fired from this weapon have reduced damage falloff, overpenetrate targets, and ricochet off hard surfaces. Projectile damage increases after bounce.
  • The Fundamentals - Hold reload to change this weapon's damage type, cycling between Void, Arc, and Solar. Grants this weapon temporarily increased damage when you apply or gain an elemental buff or debuff that matches this weapon's damage type.
  • Polygonal Rifling
  • Alloy Magazine
  • Composite Stock

The Colony - Grenade Launcher

  • Insectoid Robot Grenades - This weapon's grenades are insectoid robots that chase targets and explode close to them. Consumes tougher combatants to create additional robots.
  • Serve the Colony - Insectoid robot grenades quickly repopulate the magazine from reserves while the Colony is unequipped.
  • Linear Compensator
  • High-Velocity Rounds
  • Composite Stock

Xur's Destiny 2 Legendary Weapons

Xur's Set of Legendary Weapons. All weapons cost 17 Strange Coins.

  • Duty Bound (Kinetic Auto Rifle)
  • Locus Locutus (Kinetic Sniper Rifle)
  • Cold Denial (Kinetic Pulse Rifle)
  • Forbearance (Energy Grenade Launcher)
  • Brass Attacks (Energy Sidearm)
  • Timelines' Vertex (Energy Fusion Rifle)
  • Sailspy Pitchglass (Heavy Linear Fusion Rifle)
  • The Slammer (Adept Heavy Sword)
  • Faith-Keeper (Heavy Rocket Launcher)
  • Crown-Splitter/Quickfang/Eternity's Edge (Heavy Sword)
  • Strange Weapon Engram (7 Strange Coins)

Play Destiny 2: The Edge of Fate. Guardians will track a mysterious signal to a location at the edge of the solar system, where they will uncover a truth that redefines their future.

The Future Is Now - A new adventure and the start of a new saga in Destiny 2. World tiers allow Guardians to select the level of difficulty that is right for them and reap the rewards that come with victory. Higher tiers offer more challenge, additional narrative threads, new secrets to uncover, and more powerful gear to collect.

Access Keplers Secrets - Hidden deep within the Reef, a new destination awaits: the mysterious planetoid of Kepler. Explore a lost human settlement and forgotten Fallen houses, and encounter new characters, all affected by a mysterious Anomaly that has twisted the destination into something menacing.

Destination Abilities - Push the limit of your Guardians capabilities and unlock the mysteries of Kepler with new destination abilities, powered by the mysterious Anomaly.

New Foes - Two new enemy combatants have entered the fray. Cut down swarming masses of Vex drones known as Kobolds, and face diabolical hovering Fallen Corsairs, each intent on standing in the way of your success.

item.title: 5 Co-Op Games To Play This Weekend (August 22 - August 24)
item.description:
With Gamescom 2025 happening this week, everyone's got games on the brain - making it the perfect weekend to grab some friends or family members (or match up with random online strangers) and enjoy a few hours of co-op gaming. This week's list of the best co-op games to play this weekend includes a mix of new releases and ongoing games which released major updates, and includes some high-intensity action battles, a little bit of strategic survival, and just a dash of pure chaos.

Marvel Rivals

The popular hero shooter Marvel Rivals recently released a major update, which debuted on August 21. The update adds a plethora of content for players, including a new map, the new Resource Rumble gameplay mode, new free rewards to claim, items to purchase from the in-game store, and more. In particular, the "Ancient Powers Awaken" event allows players to unlock costumes for Dr. Strange, Iron Fist, and more. Getting these rewards requires a good bit of XP, and the event is only around for a limited time (until September 12, when Season 4 kicks off), so this weekend is the perfect time to get into a match - or several - of Marvel Rivals with friends.

10 Images
10 Images

Followed

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Powered by

Valheim

Plenty of existing games got updates and new content revealed at Gamescom 2025, and the early access survival sandbox game Valheim is no exception. The Call to Arms update, which is currently only available via Valheim's Public Test Branch, introduces a new type of equipment called Trinkets, a brand-new Adrenaline mechanic, Wooden Weapons for practicing combat against friends, the new skill Perfect Dodge Roll, and a number of new clothing, furniture, and cosmetic items. Unlike the previous Ashlands update, Call to Arms does not require players to start a new world to access its content, so they can jump into Valheim this weekend to collect Trinkets, duel friends with wooden weapons, and more.

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

BAPBAP

Players who want to try out a new co-op game this weekend but don't have the money to drop on anything can check out BAPBAP, a free co-op MOBA game added to Steam this week. In BAPBAP, players battle against each other in a constantly shrinking arena, gaining access to new skills as the game goes on. It currently has primarily positive reviews on Steam, with players praising the game's chaotic nature and fast-paced, action-heavy gameplay. Given how heavily RNG factors into every battle in BAPBAP, it's perfect for playing several rounds over the coming weekend, as no two matches will ever be exactly the same.

Grounded 2

Recently released in Early Access, Grounded 2 is a survival game that shrinks players down to a tiny size and challenges them to deal with their new situation with very few resources at their disposal. In co-op mode, players can team up to craft weapons and armor, face down "giant" obstacles, build bases, ride "Buggies," and perhaps even ultimately learn the secrets of the strange playground that has reluctantly become their home. School is starting soon, so why not spend a little bit more time on the playground in Grounded 2?

Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles 2

Players can enter the world of the popular manga and anime Demon Slayer in Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles 2. This arena fighter features a story mode that covers multiple arcs from the original Demon Slayer story, with plenty of animated cutscenes along the way. Players can match up with each other online and battle it out as characters from the game's large roster, including participating in team battles where two players work together to take their opponent down. Both local and online multiplayer options are available in this title.

item.title: Metal Gear Solid Delta Review Scores Fall Just Shy of the Original Snake Eater
item.description:
Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater review scores are out, with the game receiving widespread acclaim. Nevertheless, the critical reception of Konami's latest title has still fallen short of the original Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater although not by much.

The Metal Gear Solid 3 remake was originally announced as part of the May 2023 PlayStation Showcase event. Co-developed by Konami and Oblivion Remastered developer Virtuos, the modernized version of the 2004 classic is on track for an August 28 release on PC and the current-gen PlayStation and Xbox consoles.

Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater Reviews Are Overwhelmingly Positive

The Metal Gear Solid Delta review embargo was lifted on Friday, August 22. The initial reviews are overwhelmingly positive, earning the game a "Mighty" rating on OpenCritic, derived from 48 reviews with an average score of 88 and a near-perfect 96% recommendation rate. Many reviewers have praised the game's production values and gameplay, which was described as a faithful recreation of the original combined with some quality-of-life improvements. One example of the latter is the way Metal Gear Solid Delta implements the camouflage system, allowing players to swap outfits and face paint in real time.

Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater Review Scores

  • OpenCritic : 88 average score, 96% recommendation rate (48 reviews)
  • MetaCritic : 86 average score (59 reviews)

Even compared to the enhanced edition of Snake Eater Metal Gear Solid 3: Subsistence , released in 2005the remake was praised for its more intuitive controls, allowing for smoother aiming and easier transitions into and out of cover. In terms of criticism, some reviewers found the game to be too easy, arguing that modernized controls and over-the-shoulder camera make patrols non-threatening and turn bosses into pushovers. The developers seemingly anticipated this complaint, which may be why Metal Gear Solid Delta also offers an alternative top-down perspective that directly impacts its difficulty and was designed to mimic the original experience. Some reviewers also identified performance as an occasional pain point, citing graphical glitches with hair and reflections, as well as sporadic cutscene stuttering.

Original Snake Eater Still Reviewed Better Than MGS DeltaThough Not By Much

Looking at the broader picture, the game's overall critical reception fell short of the original Snake Eater . However, the difference isn't massive, with the 2004 game holding a 91 score on MetaCritic, based on 68 scores. As of August 22, Metal Gear Solid Delta has an 86 score on the same platform, based on 59 reviews. Since the review embargo was only lifted a few hours ago as of this writing and there's still nearly a week until the game hits the market, its average scores could still shift. Be that as it may, the chances of the remake exceeding the original now appear slim, as it's rare for day-one review averages of single-player games to change by more than a couple of points.

Reviewers generally agree that the newly released remake serves as an ideal entry point for newcomers. Beyond being the most recent release, Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater 's story is also the earliest in the series chronology, thus requiring no pre-existing knowledge to follow.

6 Images
6 Images

Followed

item.title: 5 Short Games to Play This Weekend (August 22 - August 24)
item.description:
Short and sweet isn't exactly the modus operandi of most big games companies, but it's certainly a motto that appeals to a lot of gamers. Sometimes, you just don't have time for a super-long game like Persona 5 or The Witcher 3 , which can feel like taking on another joba fun job, to be sure, but a time-consuming obligation nonetheless, assuming you want to see all a given game has to offer.

That's why brief, condensed gaming experiences, which so often come from the indie space, are so valuable. Lightweight and focused, the following recommendations are tailor-made to provide audiences with the best entertainment or artistic value in the shortest amount of time. Put another way, they are all killer, no filler, and well worth diving into this weekend.

Steamworld Dig

How long to beat Steamworld Dig

  • Main story: 5 hours
  • Completionist run: 8.5

Steamworld Dig is one of those games that feels like it shouldn't be as good as it is. On the surface, it's a rather standardeven derivativemining and resource-management game with light RPG elements, but it's shockingly addicting. Perhaps it's the robo-steampunk art design or the charming Wild West backdrop, but Steamworld Dig is notably compelling, and you could very well tear through its main story in an evening or two, making it an ideal, lightweight snack to unwind with at the end of the week.

Your comment has not been saved

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

SteamWorld Dig is a platform mining adventure with strong Metroidvanian influences. Take the role of Rusty, a lone mining steambot, as he arrives at an old mining town in great need. Dig your way through the old earth, gaining riches while uncovering the ancient threat that lurks below...
After making a huge impact on the Nintendo 3DS eShop, we've decided to bring SteamWorld Dig to PC/Mac/Linux. Introducing HD graphics , achievements and more, the game has been optimized for Steam!
Key Features: A rich world of steam-driven robots, inspired by Steampunk and Western themes, Explore an underground world full of secrets, treasure and terrors, Uncover the remnants of human civilization, a degenerate race of dynamite-wielding troglodytes, Randomized worlds with emergent gameplay.
Additions: Compared to the Nintendo 3DS version, this release has: HD graphics: Beautiful, high-resolution (1080p) graphics, Gamepad support: Keyboard, gamepad - play the game your way!, Achievements: Completionists rejoice!, Eye candy: Animated character portraits, bloom filter and more!, Trading cards: With a character set like this? Of course!

Franchise
SteamWorld
Platform(s)
3DS, PC, PS4, PS Vita, Switch, Xbox One, Nintendo Wii U
OpenCritic Rating
Strong
Powered by

SUPERHOT

How long to beat SUPERHOT

  • Main story: 2.5 hours
  • Completionist run: 20 hours

Few games are able to deliver on their premise in the same way that SUPERHOT does. In its case, the premise is rooted in a core mechanic: time only moves when the player moves, and at the player's speed. The player's offensive abilities, most of which are determined by the environment they are in, are all informed by this unique temporal system, and the result is an experience that is both intense and startlingly tactical. Its main campaign is short and sweet, but I've milked close to 100 hours out of this game over the years, so it definitely has long legs.

SUPERHOT is great on any platform, but SUPERHOT VR is especially fantastic, and arguably the definitive version of the game.

Blurring the lines between cautious strategy and unbridled mayhem, SUPERHOT is the smash-hit FPS in which time moves only when you move.

No regeneratig health bars. No conveniently placed ammo drops. It's you, alone, outnumbered and outgunned. Snatch weapons from fallen enemies to shoot, slice and dodge through a truly cinematic hurricane of slow-motion bullets

Do you crave meaning? Acceptance? Decrypt a deep and multi-layered narrative. Find the answers you seek. Mind is software. Let the System set you free.

Innovation - a truly original hybrid puzzle-shooter title like no other. Time only moves when you do. No need to hurry, take your time.
Story & Lore - in a way you have never experienced before.
Many Extras delve deeper into SUPERHOT with mini-games, challenges, ASCII art, and [redacted].
Challenge Mode replay SUPERHOT with no restarts, speed runs, and more.
Endless Mode how long can you last against unyielding waves of enemies?

Bo: Path of the Teal Lotus

How long to beat Bo: Path of the Teal Lotus

  • Main story: 10 hours
  • Completionist run: 18.5 hours

An astonishing breakout game from indie developer Squid Shock Studios, Bo: Path of the Teal Lotus is about as charming as it looks, though it hides mechanical depth behind a cutesy facade. Indeed, there are countless stylish, hand-drawn indie side-scrollers out there, but few manage to be as relentlessly fun as Path of the Teal Lotus , whose locomotion and combat systems facilitate addictive gameplay that will spirit you through its brief campaign.

DRIFT DOWN FROM THE CELESTIAL REALM: Flow with acrobatic grace and agility through a mysterious world of myth and legend in B: Path of the Teal Lotus, a colorful hand-drawn adventure inspired by Japanese folklore.

Undertake a mystical journey as B, a celestial blossom (fox tentaihana) descended from the heavens to fulfill a mysterious ancient prophecy. Use your legendary b staff to bounce and glide fluidly through an otherworldly realm of hand-drawn, dreamlike landscapes, strange and adorable yokai, and massive monsters summoned from ancient legends of Japan.

DISCOVER A MYSTERIOUS AND HAUNTED WORLD: Explore a diverse and interconnected world in a 2.5D side-scrolling action-platformer with Metroidvania elements. Journey to a haunted castle, a thriving Japanese-inspired metropolis, and many more strange and wondrous placesthen find ways to travel back and fully explore newly unlocked paths and surprises.

FIND YOUR FLOW: Navigate the worlds platforming challenges with acrobatic precision, elegance, and finesse. Use Bs distinctive move-and-reset system to reach new areas efficiently or recover when your footing flounders.

Platform(s)
PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Nintendo Switch, PC

How Long To Beat

Powered by

Mouthwashing

How long to beat Mouthwashing

  • Main story: 2.5 hours
  • Completionist run: 3.5 hours

Here we take a turn from cute to dark and distressing: Mouthwashing is one of the most haunting, thought-provoking, and surreal games I've played in quite a while. It takes place on a marooned space delivery ship in the far future, its crew already butting heads, to put it mildly. What unfolds from this starting point is a brutal and confronting story about responsibility, jealousy, and the devastation of losing one's integrity. For as bizarre and psychedelic as it can be, it's also undeniably human and sobering, and an absolute must-play.

Mouthwashing is a first-person horror game following the dying crew of a shipwrecked space freighter.

Who could have known what good ol Captain Curly was capable of? Guess he thought his crew dying alongside him was only right. But some men cant even kill themselves properly. Maimed, limbless and unable to speak, but alive, Curly is now at the mercy of the crew he has doomed to a slow death.

Descend into Madness
Follow the lives of the crew as they weather starvation, isolation, and each other. People were never your strong suit anyway.

Zero Chance of Rescue
The ship will run out of power within six months. Food rations long before that.

Immersive Storytelling
Pay attention to your surroundings.

Psychological Scares
Your eyes are lying.

Unforgiving Narrative
Hope to die, or for goodness sake, pray that everyone else did.

Steam Deck Compatibility
Verified

Powered by

Who's Lila?

How long to beat Who's Lila?

  • Main story: 2.5 hours
  • Completionist run: 7 hours

Another surreal, oft-disturbing narrative experience, Who's Lila can perhaps best be described as a supernatural detective game, though even that in-a-nutshell description is insufficient. The truth is, Who's Lila is probably not like any other game that you've played before. Its combination of Lynchian story beats, Super Mario 64 main menu face-tweaking, and sharp writing make for a uniquely unnerving game, one that will likely stick with you for much longer than its brief runtime.

3 Images
3 Images

Your comment has not been saved

Follow
Followed
Who's Lila?
Horror
Psychological
Point-and-click
Visual Novel
Puzzle
Systems
Released
February 24, 2022
Developer(s)
Garage Heathen
Publisher(s)
Garage Heathen, IndieArk
Engine
Unity
Steam Deck Compatibility
Verified

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Who's Lila is a point-and-click adventure where, instead of choosing dialogue options, you control the character's face manually.

Lifes never been easy for William, but today is special a girl named Tanya Kennedy suddenly goes missing and the only thing Will's friends know he was the one to see her last.

Will you remain secretive and make William act as though nothing happened, or will you let true emotions show through his mask?

In Who's Lila, a specifically trained face-recognizing neural network allows you to make this choice! In dialogue, instead of choosing a text option, input facial expressions by moving parts of the characters face. The neural network will then analyze the emotion and output the result, thus progressing the plot.

Apart from the struggles provided by your own face, you will be met with a gritty dither-punk world of Whos Lila. Prepare yourself for dream-like landscapes, surreal architecture, steam-filled factory interiors, and David Lynch-inspired beauty of the industrial and the mundane.

Sometimes there is fear in the unknown, but we are good detectives and we have to know everything
David Lynch

Will you make sense of this strange story, or will you lose yourself in the beautiful mystery? Will you try to discover every possible turn of events, or will you stick to a single storyline?
And most importantly, will you be able to answer the ultimate question:

Features:
- Neural network-powered emotion detection
- 15 endings and choice-driven gameplay
- Steam achievements
- Ditherpunk visual style
- 6+ hours of gameplay
- Unlockable palettes
- 50+ unique soundtrack pieces written specifically for the game
- And more..

Platform(s)
PC
How Long To Beat
2.5 hours

item.title: Roblox: Hunty Zombies Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Hunty Zombies is a Roblox game that, at first glance, appears to be superior to most other experiences. It is immediately apparent that the team has done an excellent job on all aspects of the game, which is reflected in its popularity. The impressive graphics, which surpass even some PC games, are immediately noticeable. Of course, the gameplay is also on a high level, especially when playing with friends, and that's without mentioning the variety of weapons, perks, and all kinds of items that can further increase your interest.

The developers of Hunty Zombies are very nice to the players, as, despite there being microtransactions present, players can enter a bunch of codes that can be used to get sweet rewards. We have collected all the Hunty Zombies codes in this guide, which can be found below.

All Hunty Zombies Codes

Working Hunty Zombies Codes

  • 10KEVENT - Redeem this code to get 30,000 Cash.
  • Sorryhaha - Redeem this code to get x5 Lucky Perk Spin.
  • 20KLIKES - Redeem this code to get x5 Traits.
  • 40KLIKES - Redeem this code to get x5 Traits.
  • Release - Redeem this code to get x5 Lucky Weapon Spin.
  • 30KLIKES - Redeem this code to get x10 Lucky Perk Spin.
  • Release2 - Redeem this code to get 20,000 Cash.
  • 50KLIKES - Redeem this code to get 55,555 Cash.
  • 10KLIKES - Redeem this code to get x5 Lucky Weapon Spin.

Expired Hunty Zombies Codes

  • ISCODEWORKING

How to Redeem Codes in Hunty Zombies

You don't need to be an experienced Roblox gamer to redeem codes in Hunty Zombies . The game developers care about their fans and want everything to be as convenient as possible. That's why the Codes button is conveniently located within the interface. However, if you still need help, we have created a guide explaining how to redeem codes in Hunty Zombies :

  • Launch Roblox and open Hunty Zombies .
  • Look at the right side of the screen. Find the turquoise Codes button and click on it. This will open the code redemption window.
  • Next, paste the code from the list of working codes into the text field and click the green Confirm button.

Remember that codes can expire over time, so redeem them as soon as possible to get rewards in this Roblox game.

How to Get More Hunty Zombies Codes

You can find all the Roblox codes in our guide, so we recommend bookmarking it in your browser by pressing Ctrl + D. We regularly update our guides so that you always have the latest information. However, if you want official developer resources, follow the links below:

  • Hunty Zombies Roblox game page
  • Hunty Zombies Roblox group
  • Hunty Zombies Discord server
